price: (31) So the word [i.e., decree] of our Lord has come into effect upon us; indeed, we will taste [punishment].
arabic: فَحَقَّ عَلَيۡنَا قَوۡلُ رَبِّنَآۖ إِنَّا لَذَآئِقُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: faḥaqqa ʿalaynā qawlu rabbinā innā ladhāiqūna
